enWisdom: The noble-minded one is bright whereas the wicked one is immature
Cheerfulness is kindness, frowning is meanness
Cheerfulness is the beginning of righteousness
Keeping a cheerful face is a trait of the free
Cheerfulness is the trait of the free
Cheerfulness is the first gift
Cheerfulness cools down the fire of opposition
Cheerfulness is the first gift [that can be given]
Cheerfulness makes companions affable
Cheerfulness is a trap for [ensnaring] affection
Cheerfulness renders goodness without any expense
Cheerfulness is one of the two gifts
Cheerfulness is one of the two forms of hospitality
Cheerfulness is a delightful countenance and a radiant disposition

Wisdom: بِالْبِشْرِ وَبَسْطِ الْوَجْهِ يَحْسُنُ مَوْقِعُ الْبَذْلِ
enWisdom: By cheerfulness and keeping a smiling face, the act of giving becomes virtuous

Wisdom: بِشْرُكَ يَدُلُّ عَلَى كَرَمِ نَفْسِكَ وَتَوَاضُعُكَ يُنْبِئُ عَنْ شَرِيفِ خُلُقِكَ
enWisdom: Your cheerfulness shows the nobility of your soul and your humility points to your righteous character
Cheerfulness is one of the two glad tidings
Cheerfulness is the disposition of all those who are [truly] free
Being cheerful is one of the signs of success
The cause of affection is cheerfulness

Wisdom: طَلَاقَةُ الْوَجْهِ بِالْبِشْرِ وَالْعَطِيَّةِ وَفِعْلِ الْبِرِّ وَبَذْلُ التَّحِيَّةِ دَاعٍ إِلَى مَحَبَّةِ الْبَرِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Smiling with cheerfulness, [practicing] benevolence, [performing] righteous actions and bestowing greetings invites the love of the people
Adopt cheerfulness for it is indeed a trap for [ensnaring] affection
Increased cheerfulness is a sign of benevolence

Wisdom: مَنْ بَخِلَ عَلَيْكَ بِبِشْرِهِ لَمْ يَسْمَحْ بِبِرِّهِ
enWisdom: One who is miserly towards you with his cheerfulness will not be generous with his righteousness

Wisdom: وَجْهٌ مُسْتَبْشِرٌ خَيْرٌ مِنْ قَطُوبٍ مُؤْثِرٍ
enWisdom: A cheerful face is better than a serious, frowning face
